title: Transportation
shortDescription: Transportation assistance for individuals with disabilities
description: Transportation services help individuals with autism and developmental disabilities travel to appointments, programs, work, and community activities. These providers specialize in accommodating the unique needs of passengers with disabilities, including sensory sensitivities and behavioral support during transit. Many accept APD (Agency for Persons with Disabilities) Medicaid waiver funding.
benefits: Specialized drivers trained in disability support
Consistent drivers when possible for routine
Extra time allowed for boarding and assistance
Many accept APD Medicaid waiver funding
whoCanBenefit: Individuals with autism who cannot use public transit
Those needing transportation to therapy appointments
Adults attending day programs or work
Those requiring behavioral support during transit
